timeout=10 force=true{code} *Actual Results:* Part of the nodes were not upgraded. There are no upgrade log on the not upgraded nodes. In the config ledger there are only pool upgrade txns and 12 in_progress txns. 12 of 25 nodes were upgraded. *Note that upgraded nodes used 100% of disc space and part of them was crashed due to "no space left".* *Expected Results:* All nodes should be upgraded independently on failure of the rest nodes ( ? ). Logs: https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/qanodelogs/indy-1498 >
